Dive deep into advanced Notion features, learn to create a tailored dashboard, and integrate various digital tools to enhance your class management. By the end of this course, you will
features: Zumba instructors; - Fitness studio managers; - Zumba class participants; Basic knowledge of Notion; - Familiarity with Zumba operations; - Understanding of digital task management; Diving Deeper: Advanced Notion Features Unleashed; 2.
